abstract:
\begin{abstract}

\noindent
Liouville, $SL(2,R)/U(1)$ and $SL(2,R)/R_+$
coset structures are completely described by gauge invariant
Hamiltonian reduction of the  $SL(2,R)$ WZNW theory.
\

\begin{abstract}

\noindent
Liouville, $SL(2,R)/U(1)$ and $SL(2,R)/R_+$
coset structures are completely described by gauge invariant
Hamiltonian reduction of the  $SL(2,R)$ WZNW theory.
\
